WorkItem.Description:
Repro steps on SimpleEditSample

1. Run sample and select all nodes from element1 to element2 (with Shift)
2. Expand element13 and element14 - subnodes __are not selected__. Selected items collection contains 7 elements
3. Unselect
4. Collapse element13 and element14
5. Once again select elements from element1 to element2
6. Expand element13 and element14 - subnodes __are selected__. Selected items collection contains 59 elements
WorkItem.Summary: Multiselection: sometimes child nodes are selected, sometimes not...

Comments.Message: The items are not selected, because they were never realized by the layout system. I will implement a consistent behaviour. Only visible items will be seledted by shift.
